```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(magrittr)
library(plm)
library(broom)
library(AER)
library(car)
```

```{r}
inmates <- read_csv("inmates.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(state = factor(state),
         year = factor(year)) %>%
   select(prison, educ, af_am, age, year, state, ca9, ca10, ca11)
```

### (a)

```{r part_a}
inmates %$% 
  lm(prison ~ educ + age + af_am + state + year) %>% 
  tidy() %>% 
  slice(1:4)
```

### (c)

```{r part_c}
inmates %$% 
  lm(educ ~ ca9 + ca10 + ca11 + af_am + year + state) %>% 
  linearHypothesis(c("ca9", "ca10", "ca11"))
```

### (d)

```{r part_d}
inmates %$% 
  ivreg(prison ~ educ + af_am + age + year + state |
          ca9 + ca10 + ca11 + af_am + age + year + state) %>% 
  tidy() %>% 
  slice(1:4)
```
